Message.Title: This Obama Market is a momentum push joke, nothing more...Survey:
Message.Msg: If an equity moves rapidly from $10 where it met heavy resistance to $9 on high volume, then rebounds to $9.95 on no volume, would anyone rush in to buy at $9.92 as if it was a must have, all while no news driver is present? Short answer maybe for a stock with insider knowledge, but not for the market as a whole, at least not time after time, people should learn. So much of this market is overtly one friendly hedge selling and buyer from another friend. It is scary for America that this level of unchallenged corruption has reached the highest levels to hide failure in the economy. We continue to borrow almost $3 to get $1, the borrowing declined and so did the GDP growth. The economy is unsustainable without money printing and that must eventually collapse under it's own weight.

Topic.Title: Witness: Trayvon Martin was straddling George Zimmerman

Message.Msg: "Did Zimmerman straddle Trayvon first and then Trayvon had already reversed position when the witness saw him ??" It does not matter with regards to the law. You don't have a conviction, or even a case on what might have been but for which there is no evidence. This case should have been thrown out without going to trial if they don't have some surprise witness, and that is not possible with discovery done.
